subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The loss was doubly painful for the Yankees, who lost second baseman Miguel Cairo to a strained left hamstring and were given a scare when Derek Jeter slid awkwardly into third base.
snippet: The loss was doubly painful for the Yankees, who lost second baseman Miguel Cairo to a strained left hamstring and were given a scare when Derek Jeter slid awkwardly into third base.
